S1.title: Baptism flights
S1.recorrido: Castelar, Ituzaing贸, Moreno, Marcos Paz, Merlo, Dique Cascallares.
S1.p1: A flight specially designed for those who have never experienced flying in an airplane and yearn to make it a reality.
S1.p2: Consists of a local circuit over the city and Dique Cascallares.
S1.p3: The flight lasts approximately one hour and is carried out in a PA28 WARRIOR II airplane with capacity for 1 pilot and 3 passengers, or in a more economical airplane like the Cessna 150/152, with capacity for 1 pilot and 1 passenger.
S1.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

preguntas.pregunta: Where is the experience held?
What days and times is it held?
Can people with reduced mobility experience it?
What will be done before boarding?
What payment methods do you accept?
What happens if the weather is not optimal?
How long does the activity last?
Can I cancel the reservation?

respuestas.respuesta: Experiences are held in different locations, depending on the selected experience. Departures may be from SADM (Mor贸n Aerodrome), SADF (San Fernando Airport) or SADP (El Palomar Airport), as appropriate.
We have experiences available at various times, from sunrise to sunset, every day of the week. Feel free to contact us to coordinate your next exciting aerial experience!
To ensure the safety of all passengers, in case of an emergency, it is necessary for each person to be able to leave the aircraft and move away from it on their own.

Before boarding, passengers will be welcomed and offered a detailed safety briefing, where what will be done during the flight, how activities will be carried out, and all doubts that may arise will be resolved.
We accept cash payments, bank transfers, and cryptocurrencies.

In case of unfavorable weather conditions, the decision to cancel the flight will be solely up to the Commander. In case of cancellation, passengers will be provided with a voucher so they can experience it within 15 days following the cancellation.

You can cancel your reservation without penalties up to 72 hours before the agreed departure time. If cancellation is made within the previous 72 hours, the deposit paid by the customer will be charged without possibility of refund. To modify the flight, you can do so without penalties up to 72 hours before the first agreed time. If the modification request is made within the previous 72 hours, the price of the new reservation will be adjusted. It is important to note that if the flight modification involves changes exceeding 15 days after the original date, the price will be subject to updates.
All our aircraft have a maximum takeoff weight set by their manufacturer, with the ideal weight being 70kg per passenger, maximum admitted weight 100kg.

S2.title: Romantic Flight
S2.recorrido: Castelar, Ituzaing贸, Moreno, Marcos Paz, Merlo, Dique Cascallares.
S2.p1: A exclusive flight designed to provide a unique moment, full of affection and romance, ideal for celebrating couple anniversaries or taking the big step .
S2.p2: We recommend doing this experience during the Golden Hour, to admire the last gleams of the sun in a reddish sunset and thus crown the romantic atmosphere.
S2.p3: As a gift, the company will provide a Gift Box that includes an alcoholic beverage and glasses for you to enjoy together! In addition, digital photographic material will be provided to preserve these precious memories.
S2.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S3.title: Pilot for a Day
S3.p1: A personalized flight designed for those who aspire to become pilots and want to experience handling an aircraft.
S3.p2: Designed to feel the control and power of each of our planes, in this flight, the sky is the limit and we let ourselves be carried away by the passion towards new horizons.
S3.p3: In addition, you can choose between 3 different routes: the northern circuit, the western circuit, or a local route.
S3.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S4.title: Air Transfers
S4.p1: We offer flights within the Argentine Republic to enjoy pleasure, conduct business, or access medical care (medical flights).
S4.p2: You choose the destination, we take care of the rest!

S5.title: Helicopter Flights
S5.p1: The Helitour of Buenos Aires City starts 15 minutes before the agreed time at the San Fernando International Airport, located just 25 minutes by car from Buenos Aires City.
S5.p2: But that's not all. The helicopter flight continues to explore the docks of Puerto Madero, passing by the Casa Rosada, Plaza de Mayo, and Luna Park. Then, it flies over the Torre de los Ingleses, continues through Retiro, Avenida 9 de Julio (where the Obelisk can be seen), Recoleta Cemetery, Barrio Parque, Palermo, the Planetarium, the Rose Garden, and the lakes of Palermo.
S5.p3: It also passes by the Hippodrome and finally crosses back to the riverbank near Aeroparque. It's a truly breathtaking journey!
S5.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S6.title: Skydiving
S6.p1: Embark on an adventure full of excitement and adrenaline with our incredible skydiving jumps in Chascom煤s or Lobos!
S6.p2: You have the option to get to the location on your own or experience the thrill of flying there and then jumping from another plane.
S6.p3: Feel the freedom and excitement in every jump with us!
S6.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S7.title: Day Tour to Mart铆n Garc铆a Island
S7.recorrido: Mor贸n, Palomar, San Fernando, Delta, Mart铆n Garc铆a Island.
S7.p1: Let yourself be carried away by a flight that will take you away from the chaos of the city to immerse yourself in one of the most fascinating tourist destinations!
S7.p2: Mart铆n Garc铆a Island, located in the heart of the R铆o de la Plata between Argentina and Uruguay, is known for its rich political history and delicious artisanal cuisine. The experience begins at Mor贸n Airport, from where we will fly directly to the island. There, we will be greeted by a tour guide who will take us to discover the highlights of the island, revealing both its well-known stories and the most hidden ones.
S7.p3: Afterwards, we will enjoy a delicious lunch at Comedor Sol铆s, where you can delight in their homemade recipes and relax under the sun in their charming garden. This service is all-inclusive! Ask about our Mart铆n Garc铆a - Conventional package to make the most of this unique experience.
S7.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S8.title: West Sector Circuit
S8.recorrido: Mor贸n, General Rodriguez, Luj谩n, Mercedes, Tomas Jofre, Cascallares Dam.
S8.p1: Discover the beauty of the Buenos Aires west with our exciting flight over the West Circuit.
S8.p2: For approximately 70 minutes, you will enjoy flying over Parque Leloir, the western access road, the majestic Naveira Castle, and the imposing Basilica of Luj谩n. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to admire the serene landscape of the Cascallares Dam.
S8.p3: An unforgettable experience that will connect you with the region's most outstanding places from a unique perspective in the sky!
S8.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S9.title: North Sector Circuit
S9.recorrido: Mor贸n, General Rodriguez, Pilar, Bel茅n de Escobar, Campana, Z谩rate, Los Cardales.
S9.p1: Discover the beauty of northern Buenos Aires with our exciting flight experience over the North Circuit.
S9.p2: For approximately 90 minutes, you will enjoy flying over Pilar, Escobar, the fascinating Delta Eye, the tranquil Z谩rate Brazo Largo, the imposing Basilica of Luj谩n, and the charming city of Ituzaing贸.
S9.p3: An unforgettable experience that will allow you to appreciate the most outstanding landscapes of the region from the heights!
S9.regalar: Information on how to give service 1

S10.title: International Destinations
S10.p1: We offer flights from Argentina to Uruguay, Peru, Colombia, and Brazil in our Piper Navajo aircraft, with capacity for up to 6 people (Pax).
S10.p2: Whether for leisure or business travel, we are here to make your flight experience exceptional.
S10.p3: You choose the destination, we take care of the rest!

P-NOS-1: At Baires Flights, we are dedicated to making the desire and passion for flying the skies a reality.
P-NOS-2: With extensive experience and constant updating, we offer a service of the highest quality that connects people and destinations to unite dreams and stories, creating memories and unique experiences. We have a wide fleet that even allows those who seek to become Pilots to fulfill their dream.
REGALA: Give this experience as a gift
P-VIVI: Alone, with family, or with friends, an unforgettable experience
P-REGALA: An unforgettable gift. Request your voucher now!
